parameters: ...does this star have the influence of
the Dark attribute? It's very weak, but...
A star with a Lord of Reason is far rarer.
Miss Tahati has mentioned before that
a flourishing star is a miracle of miracles.
Many dying stars exist on the regular.
If the power of the attribute is not aligned,
such stars will increase in number.
I feel like I understand well the mission
of the Lords of Reason now.
...This is the third time we have met.
Though I only looked at your back last time.
Let's talk, I'd like to hear what happened.
I haven't given up on anything yet.
The hope within you is a flickering ember.
Just spit it out. Your troubles.
It gets a little easier on your mind.
Why are you acting like my friend all of a sudden?
My goal is to destroy this world.
If you do not like that, then
you are my enemy. Plain and simple.
If that is so, then to try to get close to my heart
means you have some ulterior motive, don't you?
Does it look like that to you?
That is why I do not understand your purpose.
To you I may be your enemy,
but to me you are neither enemy nor friend.
However, I repeat, I am not in despair.
I believe we will meet again.
I think you mean you WANT to believe.
I am not giving up hope, no matter what.
I am sure it must be your workings, no?
I remember well the darkness that tore us apart.
I have no reason to make you suffer.
Did that name mean anything to you?
However, that ended in failure, didn't it.
So that's why your next target was──
Muracca... Talvirar's Lord of Reason, yes?
As if it's anyone's problem but you...!
I have no intention of using either her or you.
To destroy this world, I amplified the influence
of the darkness surrounding the stars of Parlates.
The aftermath of that struck Talvirar as lunacy
and struck you as pure dark energy.
Should anyone suffer, I shall help them up.
...If what you just said is true, then you
truly never had any intent to attack us.
Attacks, hm? It seems that even you
have become accustomed to the fake night.
Why do you want to destroy Parlates?
But your actions are having bad consequences.
What do you get out of hearing my reasoning?
If we talk, we may find other ways.
Your wish may come true without destroying the world!
Quality words from someone who never understood
how long I have been suffering.
...so for you, there is no other way?
What do you want beyond the destruction of the world?
Kannryuua has become the largest obstacle.
I had hoped we would slow down their momentum.
I managed to meet her, but we didn't exchange a word.
We weren't very close from the start.
Do not forget that I still don't trust you.
I just pity your despair, that is all.
...What I see, is hope for the future.
And yet, our purpose is the same.
The world will go to sleep──
And the true night shall arrive.
シニュニーヌ完了時は目的更新
If nobody is there, no response should be heard.
From behind that Child of Light...
In the end, the promise was not fulfilled.
So what I must do, is one thing only.
トーリオン完了時は目的更新
